pronunciation: CORMORANT, [Cormorant is supposed to be corrupted from corvus marinus, sea raven. The Welsh also call the fowl morvran, sea crow.]

definitions.text:
1. The water raven, large fowl of the pelican kind; the head and neck are black; the coverts of the wings, the scapulars and the back are of deep green, edged with black and glossed with blue. The base of the lower mandible is covered with naked yellow skin, which extends under the chin and forms sort of pouch. This fowl occupies the cliffs by the sea, feeds on fish, and is extremely voracious.
2. glutton.
